timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason why you make the subscription for the submission in exam-participation.component.ts? Wouldn't it make more sense to do it in the programming-exam-submission.component.ts?
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: Because the programming exam submission gets destroyed when we navigate to the end page and summary page. When the student triggers a build right before the end, it is more probable, that the latest submission will be displayed in the summary page, becuase we can still retrieve the latest submission, while the student is filling out the end page
replies.author: TobiasPr
